title: Riot Girl Tristana skin code?
body: I liked the League of Legends Facebook Page but it said that the code does not exist and i can't get the free Tristana and the skin. If you guys have the power to, could you give the Tristana and the skin. Thx.

replies.body:
We can certainly help you out if you [submit a support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our specialists can take care of this for you! :)

Let me know if you have any questions.
I found out that I had to restart my computer to get the tristana skin but thanks for helping me.
